item.title: Large tree stump has been uprooted & left on pavement outside 157 Avenue Road, Erith, 11th August
item.description:

item.title: Huge amount of rubbish on the A2 lay-by near Eltham, 11th August
item.description:
This hasn’t been cleaned in almost two years, and the place has become absolutely abominable. Access to the lay-by for maintenance vehicles is quite easy, so having this cleaned shouldn’t be difficult, but unfortunately, the council doesn’t seem to care. What happened to the previous promise to have it cleaned by January 2025?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Way Relief Road, Avery Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street cleaning needed outside 50 Blackheath Rd, 11th August
item.description:
Outside this old school building (now residential) the street cleaning is regularly missed - outside other properties it's less of a problem. Leaves, dog fouling, rubbish buildup continues. It's getting worse and needs to be rectified.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Blackheath Road, London

item.title: The park outside the estate clearly states no dogs allowed. But people are bringing their dogs into the kids park and the kids are getting scared or chased. Can something be done about this please, 11th August
